value: Bemidji Regional Airport: This is the closest commercial airport to Erskine. It is about an hour away, with only one flight going to Minneapolis/St. Paul.
Hector International Airport: This is a much larger airport, with flights going nationwide. It is about 2 hours away.

Erskine is located at the intersection of US Highway 2 and US Highway 59.
The city park has a statue that is claimed to be the World's Largest Northern Pike.

There are several lakes in the area that are popular fishing and boating destinations, most notably Maple Lake, Union Lake and Lake Sarah.

The Rydell National Wildlife Refuge, located about seven miles south of Erskine, has an interpretive center and several miles of hiking trails.
, home of the Headwaters of the Mississippi River, is about an hour west of Erskine.
